lines.text: It's a deal, but you got to understand. Miss Yvonne, this has to be a secret between us. As you French say...
Irma, are you keeping something from me that I should know?

Jane, you can beat me, you can torture me, you can rack me on the wheel, you can quarter me into six and a half pieces, but you'll never find out from me that Yvonne, the French actress, is responsible for Steve singing at the Lucky Dollar Club.
Hear, hear! I hear there's a call for able-bodied men.
I know me! I'm able! I'm a man, and despite what you think, this is a body!
Sorry, son, I can't take you without your mother's permission.

[to Pete about Irma]
Don't shoot her in the head. The bullet'll never go through.
I miss my mother and father. They were just like parents to me.
